name: CodeSystemCatalogEntry

contact.name: Visit the Github repository for more information

description: Metadata and access information about a code system.

element.definition: Metadata and access information about a code system.

element.name: codeSystemName
element.short: the local identifier that uniquely identifies the code system within the context of the implementing service
element.definition: the local identifier that uniquely identifies the code system within the context of the implementing service. Note that the about URI is the globally unique identifier.

element.name: codeSystemCategory
element.short: the category or type of resource that the code system represents
element.definition: the category or type of resource that the code system represents.

element.name: ontologyDomain
element.short: the subject domain of the ontology
element.definition: the subject domain of the ontology

element.name: ontologyType
element.short: the nature of the content of the ontology
element.definition: the nature of the content of the ontology

element.name: designedForOntologyTask
element.short: the purpose for which the ontology was originally designed
element.definition: the purpose for which the ontology was originally designed

element.name: includes
element.short: a reference to an external code system that is included as a component of the referenced code system
element.definition:
a reference to an external code system that is included as a component of the referenced code system. The Wine Ontology,
								as an example, includes the Food Ontology as one of its components.  Similarly, the US Edition of SNOMED-CT includes the international edition.

element.name: versions
element.short: a DirectoryURI that references the known versions of this code system
element.definition: a DirectoryURI that references the known versions of this code system.

element.name: currentVersion
element.short: a reference to the code system version marked as CURRENT in the service instance
element.definition: a reference to the code system version marked as CURRENT in the service instance.

element.name: usedOntologyEngineeringTool
element.short: information about a tool used to create the ontology
element.definition: information about a tool used to create the ontology
